mapper.select: --AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STWD_LNM FROM WAM_STWD WHERE UPPER(STWD_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(STWD_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' ORDER BY STWD_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DMN_LNM FROM WAM_DMN WHERE UPPER(DMN_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(DMN_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' ORDER BY DMN_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SDITM_LNM FROM WAM_SDITM WHERE UPPER(SDITM_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(SDITM_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' ORDER BY SDITM_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SYMN_LNM FROM WAM_SYMN WHERE UPPER(SYMN_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(SYMN_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' ORDER BY SYMN_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SBSWD_LNM FROM WAM_SYMN WHERE UPPER(SBSWD_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(SBSWD_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' ORDER BY SBSWD_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUBJ_LNM FROM WAA_SUBJ WHERE (UPPER(SUBJ_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(SUBJ_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%') AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY SUBJ_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PDM_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL WHERE UPPER(PDM_TBL_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(PDM_TBL_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY PDM_TBL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_TBL_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PDM_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_ASIS_PDM_TBL WHERE UPPER(PDM_TBL_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(PDM_TBL_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY PDM_TBL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_TBL_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PDM_COL_LNM FROM WAM_PDM_COL WHERE UPPER(PDM_COL_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(PDM_COL_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY PDM_COL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_COL_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PDM_COL_LNM FROM WAM_ASIS_PDM_COL WHERE UPPER(PDM_COL_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(PDM_COL_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY PDM_COL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_COL_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DDL_TBL_LNM UNION ALL SELECT DDL_TBL_PNM AS DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DDL_TBL_PNM ORDER BY DDL_TBL_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DBC_TBL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_TBL WHERE UPPER(DBC_TBL_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DBC_TBL_NM UNION ALL SELECT DBC_TBL_KOR_NM AS DBC_TBL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_TBL WHERE UPPER(DBC_TBL_KOR_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DBC_TBL_KOR_NM ORDER BY DBC_TBL_NM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BIZ_AREA_LNM FROM WAM_BIZ_AREA WHERE UPPER(BIZ_AREA_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT BIZ_AREA_PNM AS BIZ_AREA_LNM FROM WAM_BIZ_AREA WHERE UPPER(BIZ_AREA_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' ORDER BY BIZ_AREA_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DQI_LNM FROM WAM_DQI WHERE UPPER(DQI_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT DQI_PNM AS DQI_LNM FROM WAM_DQI WHERE UPPER(DQI_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' ORDER BY DQI_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CTQ_LNM FROM WAM_CTQ WHERE UPPER(CTQ_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT CTQ_PNM AS CTQ_LNM FROM WAM_CTQ WHERE UPPER(CTQ_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' ORDER BY CTQ_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DB_SCH_LNM FROM WAA_DB_SCH WHERE UPPER(DB_SCH_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT DB_SCH_PNM AS DB_SCH_LNM FROM WAA_DB_SCH WHERE UPPER(DB_SCH_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DB_SCH_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DBC_COL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_COL WHERE UPPER(DBC_COL_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DBC_COL_NM UNION ALL SELECT DBC_COL_KOR_NM AS DBC_COL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_COL WHERE UPPER(DBC_COL_KOR_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DBC_COL_KOR_NM ORDER BY DBC_COL_NM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SHD_LNM FROM WAM_SHD_MSTR WHERE UPPER(SHD_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT SHD_PNM AS SHD_LNM FROM WAM_SHD_MSTR WHERE UPPER(SHD_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' ORDER BY SHD_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE UPPER(USER_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY USER_NM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... -- 작업명 SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BR_NM AS OBJ_NM FROM WAM_BR_MSTR WHERE UPPER(BR_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT '[스키마수집]'||DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS OBJ_NM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE UPPER(DB_CONN_TRG_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR '[스키마수집]' LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT '['||C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM||']'||A.DBC_TBL_NM||'.'||A.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.PRF_KND_CD = C.COMM_DTL_CD AND COMM_DCD_ID = 'OBJ_00000000342' WHERE A.PRF_KND_CD LIKE '%'||'PC'||'%' AND UPPER(C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(A.DBC_TBL_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(A.OBJ_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT '['||C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM||']'||A.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.PRF_KND_CD = C.COMM_DTL_CD AND COMM_DCD_ID = 'OBJ_00000000342' WHERE A.PRF_KND_CD LIKE '%'||'PT'||'%' AND UPPER(C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(A.OBJ_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT ETC_JOB_NM FROM WAM_SHD_JOB WHERE UPPER(ETC_JOB_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY OBJ_NM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_LNM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE UPPER(DB_CONN_TRG_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE UPPER(DB_CONN_TRG_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DEPT_NM FROM WAA_DEPT WHERE UPPER(DEPT_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DEPT_NM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DMNG_LNM FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE UPPER(DMNG_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT DMNG_PNM AS DMNG_LNM FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE UPPER(DMNG_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DMNG_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MENU_NM FROM WAA_PRGM_MENU WHERE UPPER(MENU_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY MENU_NM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DDL_TBL_LNM UNION ALL SELECT DDL_TBL_PNM AS DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DDL_TBL_PNM ORDER BY DDL_TBL_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete 매립지공사 기술용어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SLC_GLOSSARY_NM FROM SLC_GLOSSARY_M WHERE UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_NM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY SLC_GLOSSARY_NM UNION ALL SELECT SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM AS DDL_TBL_LNM FROM SLC_GLOSSARY_M WHERE UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM --ORDER BY SLC_GLOSSARY_NM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete APP단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT APP_STWD_LNM FROM WAM_APP_STWD WHERE UPPER(APP_STWD_LNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(APP_STWD_PNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY APP_STWD_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete APP항목 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT APP_SDITM_LNM FROM WAM_APP_SDITM WHERE UPPER(APP_SDITM_LNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(APP_SDITM_PNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY APP_SDITM_LNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete APP항목 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TGT_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_TBL_MAP WHERE UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY TGT_TBL_PNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete APP항목 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TGT_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_COL_MAP WHERE UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY TGT_TBL_PNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}

--AutoComplete APP항목 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TGT_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_COD_MAP WHERE UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' OR UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY TGT_TBL_PNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}
--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DDL_SEQ_PNM FROM WAM_DDL_SEQ WHERE UPPER(DDL_SEQ_PNM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DDL_SEQ_PNM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}
--AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DBC_SEQ_NM FROM WAT_DBC_SEQ WHERE UPPER(DBC_SEQ_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%' GROUP BY DBC_SEQ_NM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxRows}
